name: Validate Entity Id option is added to Unified search and user should see the search results based on Entity Id.

testSteps.description: Given underwriter can create quote from PAS
When underwriter selects the 'Entity id' from Unified Search dropdown
And enters the 'Entity id' in Unified Search Option search field
Then able to see the search result based on entity id
